scripts.merge:reports: [ -n "$(find cypress/reports -name '*.json' 2>/dev/null)" ] && mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/mochawesome.json || echo 'No report files found'
scripts.generate:report: [ -f cypress/reports/mochawesome.json ] && marge cypress/reports/mochawesome.json -f report -o cypress/reports/html || echo 'No mochawesome.json found'
scripts.test:with-report: npm run clean:reports && npm run test && npm run merge:reports && npm run generate:report
